title: Wilson's Tales of the Borders and of Scotland, Volume 07
author: Various
snippet: And Heiton, without putting more questions, returned to the Royal party,which was now approaching danger.

title: Wilson's Tales of the Borders and of Scotland, Volume 07
author: Various
snippet: And Heiton spurred on more hastily than ever, and never lifted rein orrested heel till he was at his own tower.

title: Memoirs of the life of Sir Walter Scott,
author: Lockhart, J. G.
snippet: " Dear Willie, — I am not desirous to buy more land at present, unless I were to deal with Mr. Rutherford or Heiton, and I would rather deal with them next year than this, when I would have all my payments made for what I am now buying.
